summary: A simple edit to your skyrim.ini file to change the density of grass. May slightly raise your FPS in outside areas.
descriptionHtml:
Locate your skyrim.ini file. It should be in your My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\ folder.
		Backup this file before editing if you have little experiance in editing ini files.		
		Do not replace your skyrim.ini file with included file, it only contains the grass info.
		Locate the [Grass] header and insert the following text so it will look like this...

		[Grass]
		b30GrassVS=0
		bAllowCreateGrass=1
		bAllowLoadGrass=0
		iMinGrassSize=100

		You can change the iMinGrassSize to show more or less grass.
		Higher numbers = less grass. Try between 50 and 150 and see what works best for you.
author: Kronixx
